update t_goods
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit = #{unit,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

goods_body = #{goodsBody,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
